content: My name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide you with an exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I understand that you did not agree on a final price. However, during the conversation, you mentioned an offer of 1200 Euros and then increased it to 1300 Euros. Was the landlord willing to accept either of these amounts?
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: The landlord was not willing to accept either of these amounts. We could not agree on a price that was acceptable to both parties.
name: Evaluator

content: Understood. Would you be willing to negotiate further with the landlord or are you considering other options?
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: I am considering other options as well. The landlord seems to be quite inflexible with the price, so I am exploring other apartments in the area.
name: Evaluator

content: Thank you for your time. Is there anything else you would like to add about the negotiation process or your experience with the landlord?
name: Farhad Abbasi
